channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Mobb Deep share first song since Prodigy’s death, from new album ‘Infinite’
item.description: 🔥 Mobb Deep drops new track from upcoming album 'Infinite'! Sending chills down our spines with their legendary flow. 🎶 #MobbDeep #Infinite

item.title: Hilary Duff Spotify Searches Increased 400 Percent After Music Comeback Announcement
item.description: 🔥 Hilary Duff is back and our Spotify playlists are living for it! Who else is hitting repeat? 🎶 #HilaryDuff #MusicComeback

item.title: Gorillaz Announces Collaborative Album ‘The Mountain’ Featuring Trueno, Idles, Bizarrap
item.description: 🎶🦍 Get ready for a wild ride with @gorillaz and their star-studded collab album 'The Mountain'! 🏔️ #Gorillaz #TheMountain

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne Makes Sweet Posthumous Appearance in Daughter Kelly’s ‘Lego Masters Jr’
item.description: 🎸 Rock legend Ozzy Osbourne is back - in Lego form! Check out his sweet cameo on 'Lego Masters Jr' with daughter Kelly! 🤘 #OzzyOsbourne #LegoMastersJr

item.title: Parcels Break Down New Album LOVED Track By Track: Exclusive
item.description: 🎶 Dive deep into @parcels' new album LOVED with an exclusive track-by-track breakdown! 🌟 Which song are you most excited to hear? #NewMusicAlert #ParcelsLoved 💿💬
